campaigns.name: Uncle Tan's Laksa
campaigns.story:
Uncle Tan's Laksa has been serving authentic laksa in Chinatown for over 20 years. Our secret recipe, passed down through three generations, has made us a beloved local institution.

Rising ingredient costs and rent increases have put us in a difficult position. We need your help to keep our family tradition alive and continue serving the laksa you've come to love.

Your support will help us upgrade our kitchen equipment, cover rent, and ensure we can continue using the premium ingredients that make our laksa special.

rewardTiers.title: Weekly Laksa Pass
rewardTiers.description: Free laksa every day for a week

updates.title: 75% Funded! Thank You!
updates.content: We're overwhelmed by your support! We've reached 75% of our goal and are confident we'll make it. Thank you for keeping our family tradition alive!

campaigns.name: Ah Hock's Barber
campaigns.story:
For 35 years, Ah Hock's Barber Shop has been more than just a place for haircuts - it's where the community gathers, shares stories, and stays connected.

Modern chain salons have made it difficult for traditional barbers like us to survive. But our loyal customers know that we offer something chain stores can't: personal service, fair prices, and genuine care.

Help us upgrade our equipment and keep this neighborhood institution alive for another generation.

campaigns.name: Mei Ling's Tailor
campaigns.story:
Mei Ling's Tailor has been creating custom garments and alterations in Little India for 15 years. Every stitch represents our commitment to quality craftsmanship.

Fast fashion has changed the industry, but there's still a place for personalized, quality tailoring. We need your support to modernize our equipment while preserving our traditional techniques.

Your contribution helps us continue providing affordable, custom tailoring to the community.

updates.title: Halfway There!
updates.content: We've reached 60% of our goal! Thank you so much for your support. Every contribution brings us closer to continuing our craft.

campaigns.name: Old Street Bakery
campaigns.story:
Old Street Bakery has been baking fresh bread and pastries in Tiong Bahru since 1985. Our traditional recipes and handmade approach make every bite special.

Equipment breakdowns and rising costs have pushed us to the edge. But the aroma of fresh bread shouldn't disappear from our neighborhood.

Help us repair our ovens, upgrade equipment, and continue being your neighborhood bakery.

updates.title: Almost There - 82% Funded!
updates.content: We're so close! Just $5,400 away from our goal. Your support has been incredible. Let's get over the finish line together!

campaigns.name: Golden Dragon Restaurant
campaigns.story:
Golden Dragon has been serving authentic Cantonese cuisine in Geylang for 28 years. Our dim sum and roast duck are legendary among locals.

The pandemic hit us hard, and recovery has been slow. We need to renovate our dining area and upgrade kitchen equipment to serve you better.

Your support means we can continue bringing families together over authentic Chinese food.

campaigns.name: Mama's Nasi Lemak
campaigns.story:
Mama's Nasi Lemak has been serving the best nasi lemak in Kampong Glam for 12 years. Our sambal recipe is a closely guarded family secret!

We're so close to securing our future! Just a little more support will help us expand our kitchen and serve more of the community.

Help us reach 100% and continue serving the nasi lemak you love!

updates.title: 91% Funded - Almost There!
updates.content: Alhamdulillah! We're at 91%! Just $1,620 more to go. Thank you for your amazing support. Let's finish strong!

campaigns.name: Heritage Bookstore
campaigns.story:
Heritage Bookstore has been Bugis's independent bookshop for 18 years. We curate rare books, host author events, and create a space for book lovers.

Online retailers have made it difficult for independent bookstores to survive. But we offer something they can't: community, curation, and conversation.

Help us keep the love of physical books alive in Singapore.

campaigns.name: Rainbow Florist
campaigns.story:
Rainbow Florist has been creating beautiful flower arrangements in Holland Village for 10 years. Every bouquet is crafted with love and care.

Supply chain issues and increased costs have made it difficult to continue. But flowers bring joy to special moments, and we want to keep spreading that joy.

Your support helps us maintain our cold storage, source quality flowers, and continue bringing beauty to the community.

updates.title: Halfway Milestone!
updates.content: We've reached 55%! Your support is helping us bloom. Thank you for believing in small businesses!

campaigns.name: Roti Prata Corner
campaigns.story:
Roti Prata Corner has been flipping prata in Little India for 22 years. Our crispy prata and rich curry are beloved by locals and tourists alike.

Our equipment is aging and needs replacement. We want to continue serving the authentic prata you've come to love.

Help us upgrade our kitchen and keep the prata flipping!

rewardTiers.title: Weekly Pass
rewardTiers.description: Free prata breakfast for a week

updates.title: 70% Funded!
updates.content: Thank you! We're at 70% and climbing. Your support means we can continue serving authentic prata for years to come!

campaigns.name: Vintage Vinyl Records
campaigns.story:
Vintage Vinyl Records has been the home for music lovers in Bugis for 14 years. We sell rare records, host listening sessions, and keep vinyl culture alive.

Streaming has changed music, but vinyl offers something digital can't: warmth, intentionality, and physical connection to music.

Help us expand our collection and continue being Singapore's vinyl sanctuary.

campaigns.name: Grandma's Kaya Toast
campaigns.story:
Grandma's Kaya Toast has been serving traditional breakfast in Joo Chiat for 30 years. Our homemade kaya and perfectly toasted bread start thousands of mornings.

We're almost there! Just a little more support and we can secure our lease and continue being part of your morning routine.

Help us reach 100% and keep the kaya toast tradition alive!

updates.title: 88% Funded - Final Push!
updates.content: We're at 88%! Just $1,680 to go. Your support has been incredible. Let's finish this together!

campaigns.name: Traditional Herbal Shop
campaigns.story:
Traditional Herbal Shop has been providing natural remedies and TCM products in Chinatown for 25 years. Our knowledge has been passed down through generations.

Modern medicine is important, but traditional Chinese medicine still has its place. We need support to continue offering natural wellness solutions.

Help us preserve this ancient knowledge for future generations.

campaigns.name: Noodle House
campaigns.story:
Noodle House has been hand-pulling noodles in Ang Mo Kio for 16 years. Every bowl is made fresh with traditional techniques you can't find anywhere else.

Rising costs have made it hard to maintain our quality standards. But we refuse to compromise on what makes us special.

Your support helps us continue crafting authentic hand-pulled noodles daily.

rewardTiers.title: Weekly Noodle Pass
rewardTiers.description: Free noodles daily for a week

updates.title: 64% and Growing!
updates.content: Thank you for your support! We're past the halfway mark and gaining momentum. Let's keep going!

campaigns.name: Craft Coffee Roastery
campaigns.story:
Craft Coffee Roastery has been roasting specialty coffee in Telok Ayer for 8 years. We source directly from farmers and roast in small batches for maximum flavor.

Our roaster needs replacement and we want to expand our training programs for aspiring baristas. Your support helps us continue our craft and educate the next generation.

Help us keep specialty coffee culture thriving in Singapore!

updates.title: 77% Funded - Almost There!
updates.content: We're at 77%! Just $7,360 from our goal. Your support is brewing something special. Thank you!

campaigns.name: Satay King
campaigns.story:
Satay King has been grilling the best satay at East Coast for 19 years. Our secret marinade and perfect grilling technique create satay that people travel across Singapore for.

Our grills need replacement and we want to expand our outdoor seating. Help us continue being East Coast's favorite satay spot.

Your support keeps the satay sizzling!

updates.title: Halfway There!
updates.content: Alhamdulillah! We've reached 52% of our goal. Thank you for your support. Let's keep the momentum going!

campaigns.name: Old School Ice Cream
campaigns.story:
Old School Ice Cream has been serving traditional ice cream sandwiches and potong in Katong for 26 years. Our vintage cart and authentic flavors bring nostalgia to every bite.

Our freezer cart needs major repairs and we want to expand our flavor offerings. Help us preserve this piece of Singapore's food heritage.

Your support keeps childhood memories alive!

rewardTiers.title: Weekly Treats
rewardTiers.description: Daily ice cream for a week

rewardTiers.title: Party Package
rewardTiers.description: Ice cream for 20 people + vintage cart rental
